tr.th: % of responses who feel anxious (often and always) (N = 662)

tr.td: From the last week, how often do you think about Novel Coronavirus Pandemic?
From the last one week, how often you feel paranoid about contacting the novel Corona Virus infection?
From the last week, how often you avoid partying?
From the last week, how often you avoid social contact?
From the last week, how often you avoid large meetings and gatherings?
From the last week, how often you avoid ordering food online?
From the last week, how often you have talked to your friends about the corona Pandemic?
From the last one week, how often you have had difficulty sleeping by being worried about the Coronavirus pandemic?
From the last week, how often you feel affected by the posts on social media about corona Virus infection?
From the last week, how often do you feel affected by the talks of Novel Corona Virus Pandemic on the newspaper and news channels?
From the last week, how often do you feel the need to buy and stock all essentials at home?
From the last week, how often do you get afraid if anyone in your social circle reports of being sick?
From the last week, how often do you feel the need to use the sanitizer/gloves?
From the last week, how often do feel the need to constantly wash your hands?
From the last one week, how often do you feel worried about yourself, and close ones regarding the spread of Novel COVID19 Viral Infection?
From the last week, how often do you use a mask without any apparent signs and symptoms of the infection?
From the last week, how often does the Idea of Novel Corona Viral Infection freak you out leading to inappropriate behaviours with anyone?
From the last week, how often does the Idea of Novel Corona Viral Infection freak you out post on social media?
